Params: {3: 'A call, filled with excitement, jolts you back to reality from the indulgent cheese waterfall of calories.'}
{2: '(Stuff the last piece of the corn dog into your mouth)', 3: '9', 4: '(Takes out the corn dog from the cheese dip)', 5: '15'}
{1: '1', 3: 'With your mouth filled, you shift your faze toward Bridget.'}
{3: 'Your sudden movement causes the corn dog to tragically break along with the stick, landing precisely in the trash can beside you.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bridget', 3: "I'll make it up to you later! Whatever you want, my treat!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Found something interesting?', 3: '28', 4: "Wait, don't walk so fast.", 5: '28'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bridget', 3: "It's so rare to come across an old arcade game like this these days!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'She stops next to an inflatable water tank. Above the water, a wobbly bench floats, while on the other side of the tank, a mechanism of targets and waterproof fabric can be seen.'}
{2: '...A dunk tank?', 3: '36', 4: "Don't tell me... that you want me to...", 5: '36'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Heehee... My commandant is the bravest person ever!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'This kind of challenge is a piece of cake for you, right?', 4: '1'}
{2: "Think I don't know about your aim?", 3: '41', 4: 'I have full faith in your aim, Bridget.', 5: '41'}
{3: 'Even with that said, she has already climbed onto the bench.'}
{3: 'Given the weighty missions of the Support Force, a moment of respite is truly precious. Naturally, you have to savor this moment with Bridget.'}
{2: 'You really want to see me soaked, huh...', 3: '52', 4: 'Hold on! What do you mean?', 5: '52'}
{3: 'Only when the sound of a ball slicing through the air reaches your ears do you realize that Bridget has begun the game.'}
{3: 'Her right arm moves in a graceful arc, showcasing the full extent of her strength with this swing.'}
{3: 'Just as you anticipated, the bench beneath you gives way, the pull of gravity seeping through every nerve in your body.'}
{2: '【kuroname】', 3: 'W-well, a cool bath may not be that bad...'}
{3: 'Yet, the anticipated feeling of drowning fails to emerge.'}
{3: 'Even with your eyes tightly shut, you can still sense that your eyelashes remain dry.'}
{2: 'Hmm?', 3: '103', 4: 'But... why does the ground feel wet?', 5: '103'}
{3: "Surveying your surroundings, you realize the water tank has been deflated by Bridget's hit, leaving only a shallow puddle around you."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bridget', 3: "I never said you'd end up in the water if I missed, 【kuroname】.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'She erupts into cheerful laughter, while the speakers on the grass continue to play a familiar tune.'}
{3: 'Some passersby also shower you with applause and cheers, nearly causing you to blush.'}
{2: "It's a surprise you prepared?", 3: '118', 4: "Just admit it, you're the one who wants to play!", 5: '120'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Only an unexpected moment like this is sure to make a special memory for you, 【kuroname】.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bridget', 3: "Hmm? But this special feature is a once-in-a-lifetime experience. Once we refill the tank, why don't you continue with the game, Commandant?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Speaking of which, I do feel a bit hungry.', 3: '123'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Still thinking about the corn dog, huh?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Okay, all the stalls on the street... you pick!', 4: '1'}
